text: @WHO @WHO_Europe @WHOEMRO @WHOAFRO @WHOSEARO @WHOWPRO @pahowho Interesting - @MassGovernor & @MassLtGov say it’s completely safe to exercise in masks and it’s required in Massachusetts.  If none of the experts agree, how can they expect the public to believe them? MA must be guaranteeing it’s safe though if they are requiring it.
